column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Steve - Thanks so much for the awesome review. I'm very glad we able to accommodate you and your family. And we greatly appreciate your kind words about our fare. Just a heads up
column2: by this time next year we will have two more JINYA outposts open in the greater Houston area
column3: so you might not have to trek into Midtown for your next ramen fix!
